text:
Try this script to see the bug: ---------- <%@ page contentType="text/html; charset=UTF-8" %> posted value: <%= request.getParameter("action") %>
multipart post:
singlepart post:
------- Tested on Tomcat 5.0.16 and 5.0.18, J2SE (build 1.4.2_01-b06) and (build 1.4.2_03-b02)
creator: kaa@348.dp.ua

text:
Only "single part" posts are parsed automatically using the Servlet API provided
methods. For multipart, you need thirdparty libs, such as commons-fileupload.
I recommend posting to tomcat-user (and you could get advice on libs for
multipart handling).
creator: remm@apache.org
